articles.title: Watch South Korea president Yoon sing ‘American Pie’ at White House - The Washington Post
articles.description: South Korean president Yoon Suk Yeol grabbed a mic and sang the Don McLean classic « American Pie » to an astonished audience at the White House state dinner.

articles.author: Anahad O’Connor
articles.title: Popular keto and paleo diets aren't helping your heart, report says - The Washington Post
articles.description: An analysis of diets by the American Heart Association gave low marks to some of the most popular ones for straying from heart-healthy eating guidelines.
articles.content:

Comment
Ketogenic and paleo diets may be trendy, but they wont do your heart any favors.

articles.title: Leading cardiologists rank the 10 popular diets - Daily Mail
articles.description: The American Heart Association (AHA) scored 10 popular diets for their potential benefits in staving off heart disease. They were scored on whether the diet promoted consuming healthy foods
articles.content:
